Perform surgical hand disinfection.sentence: The surgical team gathers all necessary supplies for hand disinfection.
Perform surgical hand disinfection.subject: The surgical team
Perform surgical hand disinfection.object: all necessary supplies for hand disinfection
Perform surgical hand disinfection.tools: disinfectant solution, disposable towels, soap, water

Perform surgical hand disinfection.sentence: The surgical team removes all jewelry and watches before starting the disinfection process.
Perform surgical hand disinfection.subject: The surgical team

Perform surgical hand disinfection.sentence: The surgical team washes their hands with soap and water for at least 20 seconds.
Perform surgical hand disinfection.subject: The surgical team
Perform surgical hand disinfection.object: their hands with soap and water for at least 20 seconds

Perform surgical hand disinfection.sentence: The surgical team applies an appropriate amount of disinfectant solution to their hands.
Perform surgical hand disinfection.subject: The surgical team
Perform surgical hand disinfection.object: an appropriate amount of disinfectant solution to their hands

Perform surgical hand disinfection.sentence: The surgical team allows their hands to air dry completely before donning sterile gloves.
Perform surgical hand disinfection.subject: The surgical team
Perform surgical hand disinfection.object: their hands to air dry completely
